actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide comprehensive mental health, psychosocial readjustment services, counseling, and other services necessary or appropriate for the effective treatment, rehabilitation, or readjustment of veterans and their dependents who are experiencing psychosocial readjustment problems resulting from military service or readjustment from military service.
short_title: Veterans and Dependents Psychological Readjustment Assistance Act of 1979

summary.text: Veterans and Dependents Psychological Readjustment Assistance Act of 1979 - Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to initiate and carry out a program for the treatment of Vietnam era veterans and their dependents who are experiencing psychosocial readjustment problems as a result of military service or as a result of problems evolving from readjustment from such service.

titles.title: Veterans and Dependents Psychological Readjustment Assistance Act of 1979

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide comprehensive mental health, psychosocial readjustment services, counseling, and other services necessary or appropriate for the effective treatment, rehabilitation, or readjustment of veterans and their dependents who are experiencing psychosocial readjustment problems resulting from military service or readjustment from military service.
